content: these warm and cozy baby lamb slippers pattern will make for perfectly warm baby feet and the crochet ears give it that extra adorable touch the pattern as step by step pictures to show you how to crochet the slippers/booties and will make it an easy pattern for beginners as well as advanced crocheters you can also find my tutorial of this pattern in my blog post materials yarn sirdar smudge/paintbox chenille light weight cotton yarn hook 5 0mm and 2 5mm
